mapper.select: SELECT r.*, h.name, l.location, u.nickname, u.birth_date, s.youth_rate, s.adult_rate, s.title from rent_place_reservation_tb AS r JOIN hole_tb AS h ON r.hole_id = h.id JOIN location_tb AS l ON r.location_id = l.id JOIN user_tb AS u ON r.user_id = u.id JOIN show_tb AS s ON r.show_id = s.id WHERE r.id = #{id};
select t.id, t.start_time, t.end_time from time_tb as t join hole_tb as h on h.time_id = t.id where h.location_id = #{locationId} group by time_id;
